panacea.imbuable_info: Combine with a potion in an anvil
advancements.ender_altar.craft_ender_alt: Craft an Ender Altar from an Ender Pearl, some Obsidian and some End Stone.
advancements.ender_altar.place_ender_alt: Place an Ender Altar which you have stabilized by giving it a name in an anvil.
advancements.ender_altar.craft_ender_alt: Craft Ender Altar Frames with End Stone and Obsidian in order to use the Altar.
advancements.ender_altar.use_ender_altar: Place two named Ender Altars with 4 frames in the world and use one to transport to the other.
advancements.nether.loot_magma_trove.des: Find and loot a Magma Trove.
advancements.nether.imbue_warted_armor.d: Imbue a piece of warted armor with a potion in an anvil.
